L-appetizers.title: Samosa
L-appetizers.description: Deep-fried pastry with a spiced filling usually made with potatoes, spices, and herbs.

L-mumbai_street_food.title: Vada Pav
L-mumbai_street_food.description: Batter fried spiced potato patty on pav with garlic chutney.

L-mumbai_street_food.title: Mumbai Pav Bhaji
L-mumbai_street_food.description: Mashed vegetables cooked with chef’s spice mix and butter, served with pan-fried buns.

L-mumbai_street_food.title: Misal Pav
L-mumbai_street_food.description: Sprouted moth beans and white pea curry with savory crisp and soft pav.

L-thali.title: Special Veg Thali
L-thali.description: An Indian Special House Thali with a combination of kebab, rice, bread, curries, lentils, soup, and a sweet dish.

L-thali.title: Special Non-Veg Thali
L-thali.description: An Indian Special House Thali with a combination of rice, bread, chicken & veg curry, lentils, and a sweet dish.

D-appetizers.title: Samosa (v)
D-appetizers.description: Pyramid fried savory pastry stuffed with curried potatoes and green peas.

D-appetizers.title: Harabara Tikki (v)
D-appetizers.description: Chopped spinach, paneer, jalapeno, mint, cilantro fritters in delicious panko coating.

D-appetizers.title: Paneer Amritsari
D-appetizers.description: Cubes of paneer marinated in yogurt, and spice.

D-appetizers.title: Tandoori Chicken
D-appetizers.description: Grilled chicken leg meat marinated in yogurt and tandoori spices.

D-appetizers.title: Lamb Seekh Kebab
D-appetizers.description: Popular and well known flavorful goat meat croquettes, seasoned with warm Indian spices and grilled.

D-appetizers.title: Chicken Angare
D-appetizers.description: Tandoor grilled chicken thigh marinated with red chilis, spices and yogurt.

D-veg.title: Bharwan Simla Mirch
D-veg.description: Bell pepper stuffed with stir-fried vegetables, paneer, and topped with spicy tomato sauce.

D-veg.title: Paneer Makhan Masala
D-veg.description: Spicy paneer tikka in rich tomato cashew sauce, and finished with cream and butter.

D-veg.title: Vegetable Kofta Curry
D-veg.description: Mince vegetable dumplings cooked in creamy spinach and cashew curry.

D-veg.title: Sarson Ka Saag with Makkai Roti
D-veg.description: Authentic North Indian green curry, mustard greens cooked with spices and served with corn flour bread.

D-veg.title: Yellow Dal
D-veg.description: Mixed yellow lentils w/ginger, garlic, green chilies, turmeric and tempered w/cumin, mustard, and fenugreek.

D-veg.title: Dhingri Mutter
D-veg.description: Button mushrooms and green peas in a rich cashew tomato sauce flavored with fennel.

D-veg.title: Veg Kolhapuri
D-veg.description: Spiced gram flour tiki w/char grilled onions, coconut, chili, stone flower, and poppy seeds.

D-nonveg.title: Lal Mas
D-nonveg.description: Succulent mutton pieces fried with a base of onion, tomato, yogurt, and a host of other spices | Caution: Dish may contain small bones.

D-nonveg.title: Malwani Pompano Fry
D-nonveg.description: Maharashtrian style whole Pompano fish marinated w/spice paste and kokum coated with rice flour and pan fried chilis and wrapped in banana leaf. A Parsi delicacy.

D-nonveg.title: Dungeness Crab Curry
D-nonveg.description: Alaskan wild-caught whole Dungeness crab cooked in a spicy tamarind coconut curry served in shell | Limited availability.

D-nonveg.title: Beef Ularthiyathu
D-nonveg.description: Kerala beef fry cooked with onion, coconut, peppercorn, fennel seeds and curry leaves.

D-nonveg.title: Pork Vindaloo
D-nonveg.description: Pork cubes marinate in malt vinegar, homemade ground spice, green chilis & garlic.

D-nonveg.title: Saoji Chicken Rassa
D-nonveg.description: Maharashtrian spicy chicken curry with char grilled onion, coconut, chili, cardamom, cloves, nutmeg, star anise, and stone flower.

D-nonveg.title: Chicken Patiala
D-nonveg.description: Punjabi dish with yoghurt & spice marinaded chicken in a cashew and creamy curry base.

D-biryani.title: Vegetable Dum Biryani
D-biryani.description: Long grain basmati rice cooked in a sealed pot, layered with vegetables and flavored with aromatic spices.

D-biryani.title: Chicken Dum Biryani
D-biryani.description: Long grain basmati rice cooked in a sealed pot, layered with chicken and flavored with aromatic spices.

D-biryani.title: Goat Dum Biryani
D-biryani.description: Long grain basmati rice cooked in a sealed pot, layered with goat and flavored with aromatic spices.

D-mumbai_street_food.description: Mashed vegetables cooked with chef’s spice mix and butter, served with pan-fried buns.

D-mumbai_street_food.description: Sprouted moth beans and white pea curry with savory crisp and soft pav.

jain.title: Makkai Palak
jain.description: Corn cooked with fresh spinach and mild Indian spices, Jain style.

jain.title: Palak Paneer
jain.description: Spinach and cottage cheese cooked in a mild, creamy sauce without onion or garlic.

jain.title: Paneer Bhurji
jain.description: Scrambled cottage cheese cooked with fresh tomatoes and Indian spices, Jain style.

dessert.title: Rasmalai
dessert.description: Delicious patties of soft chena with pistachio spiced milk.

dessert.title: Gulab Jamun
dessert.description: Traditional fried dumplings in sugar syrup.

dessert.title: Jalebi
dessert.description: Piping spirals made of fermented batter into hot oil, soaked in warm sugar syrup.
